Texas reported more than 10,000 new coronavirus cases on Tuesday ‚Äî eclipsing its previous record for single-day increases, which the state set on Saturday.

name: NPR
text:
Federal regulators revoked a rule that requires payday lenders to check that borrowers can repay loans, which can carry interest rates as high as 400%. 

The new rule strips a key provision crafted during the Obama administration.
https://t.co/t7JVMqDh5q

name: NPR
text:

text:

text:

text: The Jayhawks' bandleader Gary Louris talks about the band‚Äôs songwriting process, plus his collaborations with other people, including the newly renamed trio The Chicks ‚Äî who you might know better as Dixie Chicks.  https://t.co/9oUFSFoKR7

text:
Author Larry Tye draws a parallel between Sen. Joseph McCarthy's infamous smear campaign and President Trump's divisive rhetoric, saying both are "bullies" who exploit fears and "point fingers when they're attacked."

name: NPR
text:

"Can't be what you can't see,‚Äù photographer Sachi Cunningham says.
